restart
Bienvenue à l'entraînement : pour te#qualifier pour le tournoi, attrape l'anneau !#Tu peux essayer autant de fois que tu#veux.
Bullseye!#When you feel ready, you may#continue to the competition.
Tu as attrapé l'anneau ! La compétition#est ouverte.
A miss!#Try again.
A miss, but#the competition is still open
You missed completely.#Keep practicing!
Bienvenue à la compétition : attrape les#anneaux les plus difficiles pour avoir plus#de points. Tu as [maxRuns] essais.
Bien joué ! Tu as obtenu [runScore] points,#pour un total de [cumulScore] points.#Il te reste[remainRuns] tentatives.
Excellent! You got [runScore] points,#total score is [cumulScore] points#The Bonus track is unlocked#[remainRuns] runs remaining.
Congratulations!#You got [runScore] points, total score is [cumulScore] points#
Félicitations! Tu as obtenu [runScore] points#pour un total de [cumulScore] points.#Gagne des points supplémentaries sur la#piste bonus !
You missed - total score is still [cumulScore] points#Try again, you have [remainRuns] runs to go.
You missed - total score is still [cumulScore] points#Get extra points on the bonus track!#[remainRuns] runs remaining.
You have no points,#and [remainRuns] runs to go.#Try again!
Missed!#You didn't collect any rings.#Perhaps you need a little practice?
Congratulations!#You got [runScore] points#for a total of [cumulScore] points.
Congratulations! You got [runScore] points#for a total of [cumulScore] points.#Get extra points on the bonus track!
Good!#Your total score is [cumulScore] points#Try the bonus track for extra points!
Congratulations!#You got [runScore] points#for a total of [cumulScore] points.
Missed!#You didn't collect any rings.#Perhaps you need a little practice?
Bienvenue à la piste bonus :#touche les ballons pour#avoir des points en plus.
Bien#[runScore] points bonus ajoutés,#pour un score final de [totalScore] points.
Nice!#[runScore] bonuspoints were added,#for a final score of [totalScore] points.
Nice!#[runScore] bonuspoints were added,#for a final score of [totalScore] points.
Unlucky, you missed all balloons.#The final score is [totalScore] points.

help.text: Are you ready? While riding your horse, try to collect rings with your lance. To control the lance, click and drag it with your cursor. Practice, practice. The lance is heavy so you may have to release and drag several times to keep the lance in the right position. If you choose Hard skill, the rings will be smaller and harder to collect.
